name: Greenomy
description:
Greenomy is a simple management game with overly complicated game that deals with the niches of bureaucracy in a world plagued by natural disasters on a (nearly) monthly basis and facing the short-end stick of nature's wrath.  Its features include:

  1. Complicated mechanics that are hard to understand at the first and require multiple attempts to properly understand.
  2. Natural Disasters that occur almost monthly
  3. A country relations system where a strained relation could mean war (probably with sticks and stones) and a good relation means offering discounts
  4. A limit on the actions you can do per month

How long will you survive? Can you adapt to this new world?
